languages.text: "Святой Трон... Глейто, цель — Паскаль, частичное сопровождение и охрана. Если ты и убьешься о свое познание, то не в мою смену".
languages.translation_comment:
While searching for Calcazar on Necron worlds in Chapter 5.
Pasqal: "This sector is full of ancient xenocorruption. It is not listed as explored. I estimate high exploration potential!"

traits.locale_text: "Святой Трон... Глейто, цель — Паскаль, частичное сопровождение и охрана. Если ты и убьешься о свое познание, то не в мою смену".

languages.text: "By the Holy Throne... Glaito, target: Pasqal; partial escort and protection. If your knowledge finally gets you killed, it won't happen on my watch."
languages.translation_comment:
While searching for Calcazar on Necron worlds in Chapter 5.
Pasqal: "This sector is full of ancient xenocorruption. It is not listed as explored. I estimate high exploration potential!"
languages.original_text: "Святой Трон... Глейто, цель — Паскаль, частичное сопровождение и охрана. Если ты и убьешься о свое познание, то не в мою смену".

"By the Holy Throne... Glaito, target: Pasqal; partial escort and protection. If your knowledge finally gets you killed, it won't happen on my watch."

languages.text: 「聖なる王座にかけて…グライト。ターゲット：パスカル。部分的な護衛と保護を実行せよ。お前の知識が後で命取りになるとしても、少なくとも俺の目の届くところでは死なせはしない」
languages.original_text: "By the Holy Throne... Glaito, target: Pasqal; partial escort and protection. If your knowledge finally gets you killed, it won't happen on my watch."

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる王座にかけて…グライト。ターゲット：パスカル。部分的な護衛と保護を実行せよ。お前の知識が後で命取りになるとしても、少なくとも俺の目の届くところでは死なせはしない」

languages.text: "Beim Heiligen Thron ... Glaito, Ziel: Pasqal; Eskorte und Schutz. Euer Wissen wird Euch irgendwann töten. Aber nicht, wenn ich es verhindern kann.."
languages.original_text: "By the Holy Throne... Glaito, target: Pasqal; partial escort and protection. If your knowledge finally gets you killed, it won't happen on my watch."

traits.locale_text: "Beim Heiligen Thron ... Glaito, Ziel: Pasqal; Eskorte und Schutz. Euer Wissen wird Euch irgendwann töten. Aber nicht, wenn ich es verhindern kann.."

languages.text: « Par le saint Trône... Glaito, cible : Pasqal, pour escorte et protection partielles. Si vos connaissances doivent vous mener à votre perte, ça n'arrivera pas tant que je serai là. »
languages.original_text: "By the Holy Throne... Glaito, target: Pasqal; partial escort and protection. If your knowledge finally gets you killed, it won't happen on my watch."

traits.locale_text: « Par le saint Trône... Glaito, cible : Pasqal, pour escorte et protection partielles. Si vos connaissances doivent vous mener à votre perte, ça n'arrivera pas tant que je serai là. »

languages.text: «Por el sagrado Trono... Glaito, objetivo: Pasqal; protección y escolta parcial. Si su conocimiento termina costándole la vida, no será en mi presencia».
languages.original_text: "By the Holy Throne... Glaito, target: Pasqal; partial escort and protection. If your knowledge finally gets you killed, it won't happen on my watch."

traits.locale_text: «Por el sagrado Trono... Glaito, objetivo: Pasqal; protección y escolta parcial. Si su conocimiento termina costándole la vida, no será en mi presencia».

languages.text: “黄金王座在上……格雷托，目标：帕斯卡，在一定程度内执行护送与守护任务。就算你的知识最终真的会害死你，我也绝不允许这种事情发生在我眼皮底下。”
languages.original_text: "By the Holy Throne... Glaito, target: Pasqal; partial escort and protection. If your knowledge finally gets you killed, it won't happen on my watch."

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上……格雷托，目标：帕斯卡，在一定程度内执行护送与守护任务。就算你的知识最终真的会害死你，我也绝不允许这种事情发生在我眼皮底下。”

languages.text: "Kutsal Taht aşkına... Glaito. Hedef: Pasqal, kısmi refakat ve koruma. Ben olduğum sürece bildiklerinden dolayı ölmeyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "By the Holy Throne... Glaito, target: Pasqal; partial escort and protection. If your knowledge finally gets you killed, it won't happen on my watch."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal Taht aşkına... Glaito: Hedef. Pasqal, kısmi refakat ve koruma. Ben olduğum sürece bildiklerinden dolayı ölmeyeceksin."
